Package com.zookitec.layout

Contains the core ExplicitLayout classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LayoutListener Interface for classes that can be notified each time ExplicitLayout lays out its container.
 

Class Summary
ComponentEF An expression factory used to create expressions for attributes of a component.
ContainerEF An expression factory used to create expressions for attributes of the container being laid out.
ExplicitConstraints This class contains expressions that define the location and size of a component.
ExplicitLayout A layout manager that provides explicit control over the layout of components.
Expression This class represents a constant expression and is the superclass of all variable expressions used by ExplicitLayout.
GeomEF An expression factory used to create expressions for points on geometric shapes.
GroupEF An expression factory used to create expressions that depend on attributes of a group of components.
MathEF An expression factory used to create expressions for common mathematical operations.
 

Package com.zookitec.layout Description

Contains the core ExplicitLayout classes.

ExplicitLayout is a flexible, extensible and easy to use layout manager for Java. A layout manager controls the visual placement of components in a container. ExplicitLayout has been designed to enable Java developers to implement almost any component layout quickly, intuitivly and without compromise.
